org.rcsb.mbt.controllers.update
Interface IUpdateListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DerivedInformation, GlGeometryViewer, SceneController, StructureComponentInspector
public interface IUpdateListener

Anything that wants to be notified when the model changes (structures added, removed) will implement this interface

Author:
John L. Moreland
See Also:
StructureModel, UpdateEvent
